trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Muncie
There were no other sightings in Muncie on or around November 25th 2009
Summary: While traveling east on SR32 out of Muncie I witnessed an object in the sky I have never seen before.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading home to Winchester Indiana on SR32 on the east side of Muncie and as I looked up in the air to the north of muncie I saw to very shiny silver objects close together. One of the objects took on a more western heading and I lost sight of it but the other remained in view for a few minutes before I was out of viewing range. At first I thought it was just a Jet but after watching it for a while I could tell that it was not moving like a jet at all but it seemed to be travelling at a slower rate of speed. Also, it was leaving no contrail whatsoever and it appeared to be at a similar altitude as what you expect a jet to be at. The object appeared to round or its reflection would lead to that assumption. One thing I know is that it was not a commercial jet airliner. It was unlike anything I had ever seen before. Again, it rate of travel was unlike anything I have ever seen. eerie to say the least.
